text: Moses guu lawa di wanga nia gowaa i bahi i dua o Jordan gi nia madawaawa e lua mo di baahi. (Nia hagadili o Joseph gu wwae lua guu hai nia madawaawa e lua: go Manasseh mo Ephraim). Malaa, Moses digi wanga dana gowaa gi di madawaawa Levi, dela hua ne wanga ginai nadau waahale belee noho ai digaula, mo nia gowaa e dugu ai nadau manu mo nadau siibi.14.3-4 Numbers 32.33; 34.14-15; Deuteronomy 3.12-17
